text:
Any of our new volunteers who have joined us recently, tomorrow night we'll have our regular Hack Night. Anyone is welcome to stop by, we'll be working on a variety of projects. It's also a good chance to see our "office" and get familiar with the equipment we use.

6:30pm tomorrow night, details in thread <https://nycmesh.slack.com/archives/C02QBP74B/p1696876920194219?thread_ts=1696876920.194219&cid=C02QBP74B|https://nycmesh.slack.com/archives/C02QBP74B/p1696876920194219?thread_ts=1696876920.194219&cid=C02QBP74B>

Posting to volunteer again for the new people who have joined. We have an upcoming outreach event at the Coney Island Maker Faire on Oct 7th and 8th.
Looking for people to help out with running the table.

Details: <https://nycmesh.slack.com/archives/C02UK9Z8W/p1693536918586919>
Volunteering opportunity this weekend at 7909 corner of Leonard st and Norman ave in greenpoint to add SXT/LBE to existing install.
Im not too far away—let me know what time

Hello,
I am going to be leading an install tomorrow at 1460 Flatbush Avenue, a far expansion down into Central Brooklyn, in the late afternoon. It's going to be a bit of a larger install and I could use a few hands! I am hoping to install a couple of antennas on the roof to two hubs to create a <https://www.nycmesh.net/map/nodes/14391-2701-3461|loop>. The building super is on board with this building becoming a hub so I am obviously super stoked. Let me know if you can join!

Deadline Extended:

there is an opportunity to volunteer with Americorps to assist migrants in applying for work authorization.  <https://www.mobilize.us/nycpeu/event/581078/?force_banner=true&share_context=event_details&share_medium=copy_link|sign up> by tomorrow, Sun Sep 17 today, Tue Sep 19, if you want to help.  they are looking for people who can commit to 5 four-hour shifts through the end of the month.

Upcoming volunteering opportunity for the Coney Island Maker Faire (Fair???). (<https://coneyisland.makerfaire.com/|main website link>)

We've been approved to set up a table at the faire happening October 6th to 8th in Coney Island to talk to people about the mesh.
We will need people to help out and take shifts at the table over the weekend. (Rotating so not everyone is there the whole time)

I've got confirmation that 6 people will be able to get free passes for the faire. I'll give these to myself and the 5 people who are at the table the most over the weekend. Other volunteers may need to buy tickets, though I have been told I can request additional passes so I might be able to get more.

Thread in <#C02UK9Z8W> (<https://nycmesh.slack.com/archives/C02UK9Z8W/p1693536918586919|link>), please reply in the thread if you are interested in helping out.
There is also a Google Sheet schedule to claim table shifts. First come-first served, but if a lot of people are interested I might try to move things around a bit and give everyone a chance to help out. (There are 2 people + me per shift due to limited space at the table)

Also unrelated to the mesh table, the faire is also looking for people to do marketing leading up to the event in exchange for free tickets. Either putting up posters or 3d printing marketing materials. Info for that: <https://coneyisland.makerfaire.com/streetteam/> <https://coneyisland.makerfaire.com/3dteam/>

Hi y'all, I've been talking with <@U01JREUEJ4E> about installing APs at his community garden in Bushwick to help migrants get connected to the Internet. We're looking at doing it on Saturday. What time works for people, I'm thinking 10AM-ish so we don't get caught in the rain, but will be fun regardless!
Location: Lewis Ave between Myrtle Ave and Stockton Street
(Please reply in thread if you're coming, all are welcome and we need hands)

Volunteer opportunity at Grand Street tomorrow 29-July(Sat)@9:30am. Please indicate on linked message if you can make it.
<https://nycmesh.slack.com/archives/C04TZ6599SB/p1690474707838089?thread_ts=1690474707.838089&cid=C04TZ6599SB|https://nycmesh.slack.com/archives/C04TZ6599SB/p1690474707838089?thread_ts=1690474707.838089&cid=C04TZ6599SB>
